selection_reasoning: The selection includes the new top performer (trial_2_1), which utilizes a force-directed initialization, alongside the previous best and diverse strategies like basin-hopping, Sobol sequences, and greedy placement to ensure a broad search space for the next generation.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest score so far (2.6307). The force-directed approach combined with multiple attempts and SLSQP optimization is highly effective for finding dense packings.
Previous best from Gen 1 (2.6260). It uses a different optimization strategy that might be combined with the force-directed initialization.
Strong performance (2.6224) using basin-hopping. This global optimization technique is robust and provides a good alternative to the multi-start approach of 2_1.
Uses Sobol sequences for initialization. While the score is lower (2.5968), the uniform distribution strategy provides good structural diversity.
Greedy placement strategy. Although it scored 2.4996, the incremental construction method is fundamentally different and could be improved with better local search.
